arts.ttl: £75m-rated star linked with Chelsea and Liverpool could turn down Blues move
arts.sum: Crystal Palace defender Marc Guehi has been heavily linked with a move away from the club in recent months. The 24-year-old has established himself as one of the best defenders in the Premier League and naturally, the top clubs are on securing his signature. According to a report from Football Insider, Chelsea are keen on […] The post £75m-rated star linked with Chelsea and Liverpool could turn down Blues move appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: 'For me': Andoni Iraola names which Chelsea player was the 'difference' in Bournemouth’s 1-0 defeat
arts.sum: He was excellent against the Cherries.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca explains one thing Jadon Sancho needs to perform to his best
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca appeared to aim a sly dig at Erik ten Hag after Jadon Sancho made an impressive debut for Chelsea in their win against Bournemouth on Saturday evening. Chelsea were far from their best and can count themselves fortunate to have won, with Robert Sanchez making several brilliant saves, including Evanilson’s first half penalty. […] The post Enzo Maresca explains one thing Jadon Sancho needs to perform to his best appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: I saw 'excellent' Chelsea star play his best game in a blue shirt against Bournemouth - opinion
arts.sum: One of the best performances in the Premier League this season so far!

arts.ttl: What Robert Sanchez and Moises Caicedo were caught arguing about during Bournemouth clash - journalist
arts.sum: Both players had good games overall.

arts.ttl: Premier League record broken in Bournemouth vs Chelsea as Anthony Taylor involved in new controversy
arts.sum: Eight of these bookings were dished out to the Blues as Wesley Fofana, Marc Cucurella, Robert Sanchez, Nicolas Jackson, Levi Colwill, Jadon Sancho, Renato Veiga and Joao Felix all received cautions. Chelsea and AFC Bournemouth have broken the record for the most yellow cards recorded in a single Premier League game.

arts.ttl: Arsenal legend sets Raheem Sterling challenge - 'He will want to prove Chelsea wrong'
arts.sum: Sterling was facing the prospect of a spell out in the cold before Arsenal swooped on transfer deadline day to sign him on a season-long loan deal

arts.ttl: Every word Enzo Maresca said on Jadon Sancho, his half-time message and Christopher Nkunku plan
arts.sum: The performance second half changed completely but we need to learn this kind of things if we want to build something important and we want to win games first of all we need the desire to win games, win duels and to fight together. At the end of the game I said to the players Christoph, Cole Palmer, Jadon, Joao, Noni, Mischa, Pedro, they are not going to play all the games.

arts.ttl: Why did Enzo Fernandez miss Chelsea's win against Bournemouth?
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca confirms why Enzo Fernandez was absent from Saturday's 1-0 Premier League win over Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth 0-1 Chelsea: Player ratings as Nkunku secures late win for Blues
arts.sum: The hosts' early pressure continued when Axel Disasi and Wesley Fofana were caught in a mix-up in the Bournemouth's left channel and Tavernier was able to cross for Evanilson. Nicolas Jackson tested Mark Travers with a lot effort following a clever through ball from Levi Colwill as Chelsea looked to turn possession into the opening goal.
